info.title: MySQLManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure management API provides create, read, update, and delete functionality for Azure MySQL resources including servers, databases, firewall rules, VNET rules, security alert policies, log files and configurations with new business model.

get.description: Retrieve the Query-Store query texts for specified queryIds.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: queryIds
parameters.description: The query identifiers

get.description: Retrieve the Query-Store query texts for the queryId.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: queryId
parameters.description: The Query-Store query identifier.

get.description: Retrieve the Query-Store top queries for specified metric and aggregation.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName

requestBody.description: The required parameters for retrieving top query statistics.

get.description: Retrieve wait statistics for specified identifier.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: The name of the server.

parameters.name: waitStatisticsId
parameters.description: The Wait Statistic identifier.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

queryExecutionCount.description: Number of query executions in this time interval.

QueryStatisticProperties.description: The properties of a query statistic.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

queryId.description: Query identifier unique to the server.

QueryTextProperties.description: The properties of a query text.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

TopQueryStatisticsInput.description: Input to get top query statistics

aggregationWindow.description: Aggregation interval type in ISO 8601 format.

numberOfTopQueries.description: Max number of top queries to return.

TopQueryStatisticsInputProperties.description: The properties for input to get top query statistics

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

value.description: The list of top query statistics.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

count.description: Wait event count observed in this time interval.

totalTimeInMs.description: Total time of wait in milliseconds in this time interval.

WaitStatisticProperties.description: The properties of a wait statistic.

aggregationWindow.description: Aggregation interval type in ISO 8601 format.

WaitStatisticsInputProperties.description: The properties for input to get wait statistics

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.
